features: 【1080P Full HD Webcam 】: Experience magnificent full-HD 1080P @ 30fps. This USB Webcam comes with enhanced capability utilizing the CMOS ⅓ image sensor. Wide 110° viewing angle. Great for webinars, and video conferencing.

【Easy to Set Up & Tripod-ready Clip】: USB webcam camera can be easily install and use, plug and play, NO additional driver required. It also features a tripod-ready adjustable universal clip (with 1.2M/3.5ft USB power cable )that fits to laptops, desktops, computers, Mac, PC, LCD monitors meet your multi-angle needs.

【Auto fix in low light and plug & play】: Automatic low-light correction technology applied in this HD webcam, so that the streaming webcam could capture the image in dim light. Automatically adjust the white balance of the image to advoid exposure picture.

【110° Wide-Angle Webcam & Stereo MIC】: Fixed focus desktop and laptop Webcam captures FULL HD video at a wide Viewing vision angle of up to 110 degrees. Giving you an unparalleled perspective for a wide variety of conditions when you live streaming or video chatting & Recording. Build-in auto noise reduction Mic Webcam filter out the unwanted background noise, makes sound purer and clearer, and pick up your voice even at 5m distance, Perfect for live streaming, webinars, video conferencing.

【Advanced Technology & Wide Application】: 1080p Full HD camera with Facial-enhancement technology optimizes the image automatically, Which makes you look great in Recording, video calling, online teaching, gaming. PC Webcam widely works with Windows 2000/XP/7/8/10 and above, Mac OS, Chrome OS, Smart TV, Android etc, Compatible with Skype, OBS, YouTube, Facebook, Twitch, Facetime, Zoom, XBOX ONE, Hangouts and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Webcam, 1080P Pro HD Webcam with Stereo Microphone, 110° Wide Angle, Privacy Cover, Tripod, for Conferencing, Live Streaming, Recording, Compatible with Skype/Zoom/YouTube

Multi-angle Adjustment The webcam can be flexibly adjusted to achieve 45°up and down and 360° left and right to meet your different shooting requirements, making your video calls as you like. Ultra Wide-Angle 110° wide-angle lens PC Webcam shows 16:9 widescreen display, makes it perfect for conferences, streaming, presentations, or any other application with this webcam. Easy to Use - Plug and Play USB webcam can be easily set up and running, no driver needed and featuring with 1.8M/6ft USB power cable, the mounting clip can be flexibly placed to any desktop/PC/tripod (Tripod included)

Versatile Compatibility This HD 1080P webcam, can be wildly applicated on major popular video software like Facebook, YouTube, Skype, Zoom, Face Time and others. For the operating devices, this webcam supports Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/ Windows 10, Mac OS, Android Smart TV and other major systems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used for WGU
reviews.reviewText: I need an external webcam for my WGU proctored exams. This was very inexpensive and easy to set up. Works perfect and meet the requirements for WGU.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this ARVIEMI Webcam, 1080P Pro HD Webcam with Stereo Microphone, 110° Wide Angle, Privacy Cover, Tripod, for Conferencing, Live Streaming, Recording, Compatible with Skype/Zoom/YouTube. After connecting to my PC, it booted right up. The fidelity is very clear and I can tell it is great quality. I've used it for several zoom sessions for work, and also live streaming. I'm happy with this product! It is also a great bargain for the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright and sleek
reviews.reviewText: The webcam is a straightforward plug-and-play device that doesn't require any downloads or installations, unlike the ones I previously owned. The video quality is clear, and the responsiveness is excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality and super easy setup

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The first webcam I received was used and had fingerprints and dust all over. I tried to plug it in and the picture was very grainy and had a washed out blue hue - this was under regular office light, it made me look like a zombie. So I requested an exchange and the replacement item is even worse. I plugged that in, and it's not even the same widescreen view - It's more like 720p NON wide-angle and even though my face was 2ft from the camera, my face was zoomed in and filling up the whole window. Buy at your own risk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for its purpose
reviews.reviewText: I currently take some online classes, so in order to use a camera for my daily meetings, I needed one. All I needed was the standard 1080p, and this was ideal—it was affordable and convenient. The product and the packaging both worked perfectly. Its design is convenient and it can be placed almost anywhere. I use a ring light that I happen to have on a base, but you could use it on my table if that's more convenient. Anyone looking for a quick and inexpensive solution without having to worry too much about what they're buying should definitely consider this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: I got this webcam to replace my faulty built-in camera on my laptop.A very easy to use camera, definitely a plug-n-play model of webcam; it gets the job done for a good price, no drivers necessary. I was able to plug it in, change exposure, and attend a meeting within 5 minutes of plugging it in for the first time.It does have HIGH exposure, though. Everything is very bright; this is meant for florescent light use, not for use at a window or in the sun. Image is also sharp. The audio is "sharp" but not too harsh. The privacy cover is an extra component to stick onto the webcam, so it's nice to choose both whether I want it there or how it's oriented. To prevent the privacy cover from also unintentionally covering WiFi/Power indicators, I placed mine perpendicular to the intuitive orientation.I was worried the mechanism to place it onto a screen would be finicky, but it has not yet slipped or unintentionally shifted since setting it up. The tripod is a great accessory to have in case it's needed. The webcam does swivel 360, and it does have an up-down swivel. The style somewhat hits like a 2008 webcam, but I don't much care as long as it works.I didn't expect to appreciate it, but the plastic protective cover that comes on the webcam does not also cover the lens or microphone. This means I can keep the protective cover on the webcam, keeping it cleaner longer while being able to use it. The lens and microphone were fine on unboxing: no scratches or damage to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top notch service
reviews.reviewText: I ordered and received the product within a 24 hr window. Product is in good shape and worked great for the first use. Will update if anything changes on quality.
